description: white cover with title in black, written in cursive; four black bars with white text form a border; at the center is a large sheet folded into fourths; unbound pages of black and white sketchy images with cursive captions; three-color abstract images; loose volume; lender's archive #085
medium: Color and black and white illustrations
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: signed in pencil on colophon page: Serge Lunal
title: Objets horaires
